author: Neha Dewan
title: ‘Covid-19 the last nail in the coffin', say MSMEs
description: ‘Covid-19 the last nail in the coffin', say MSMEsDespite the hype around MSMEs being the backbone of the economy, in this hour of need, there has been little or no assistance from the government.
content:
Jayanth Mutha, a Bengaluru-based second generation entrepreneur running a business of manufacturing agri-electrical products, is in a contemplative mode these days. 
The whys and hows of joining his family business constantly nudge him at a time when small b… [+6937 chars]
